text: e manavunikaina allah ataniki granthanni, vivekanni mariyu pravakta padavini prasadincina tarvata atadu prajalato: "Miru allah ku baduluga nannu prarthincandi." Ani anatam taginadi kadu, kani varito: "Miru itarulaku bodhince mariyu miru cadive granthala anusaranga dharmavettalu (rabbaniyyun) kandi." Ani anatam (bhavimpadaginadi)
